ComicInfo.Title: Almost Human, Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary: “Pantheon” Part 1 of 3, Guest-starring Aphrodite IV! Back in New York City, Detective Sara Pezzini, bearer of the Witchblade, still struggles to come to grips with her inhuman actions during “War of the Witchblades.” But introspection might just get Sara killed when she finds herself in the crosshairs of the mysterious and deadly Aphrodite IV! Featuring a cover by series artist Sejic and a variant cover by cover illustrator Michal Ivan (The Darkness)! Cover A – Stjepan Sejic Cover B – Michal Ivan
ComicInfo.Characters: Witchblade,Samantha Argent,Captain Peyroux,Detective Gleason,Sara Pezzini,Aphrodite IV
ComicInfo.Locations: Long Island,Paris,New York State,France,New York City
